mapper.select: SELECT IF(cr.mb_id LIKE #{myId}, "buy", "sell") AS category, g.goods_id, g.goods_title, g.goods_price, g.goods_location, gi.goods_images_path, w.wishes, trx.trx_complete_date, r.rating_id FROM ((((transaction AS trx JOIN chat_room AS cr ON trx.chat_room_id = cr.chat_room_id) JOIN goods AS g ON cr.goods_id = g.goods_id) JOIN (SELECT * FROM goods_images WHERE goods_images_thumbnail = TRUE) AS gi ON g.goods_id = gi.goods_id) JOIN (SELECT goods_id, count(mb_id) AS wishes FROM wishlist GROUP BY goods_id) AS w ON g.goods_id = w.goods_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM rating WHERE mb_id LIKE "#{myId}") AS r ON trx.trx_id = r.trx_id WHERE trx.trx_complete_date IS NOT NULL AND (cr.mb_id LIKE #{myId} OR g.mb_id LIKE #{myId}) LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{numberOfItems}
